title:
Who currently holds the position of Municipal Tax Collector for the City of Wilmington, NC?  What are the eligibility requirements / qualifications?  Is the position statutory under the General Statutes of NC?



Thanks
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/03/who-is-wilmingtons-tax-collector-and-what-are-the-qualifications/
